summary: The module implements differentiable image similarity losses for deep learning, offering a global mutual information based loss that uses Parzen window density estimation with selectable kernel functions, and a local normalized cross‑correlation loss. It also includes helper utilities to generate common kernels (Gaussian, rectangular, triangular) used in these calculations.
business_intent: Provide flexible, back‑propagatable similarity metrics to improve training of medical imaging models such as registration and segmentation, enabling more accurate alignment and better overall model performance.
